Job ID: 297
Raw description:  Apply Now Share this Job Printable View Category : Contract Location/City : ON - Toronto Date Created : 01/22/2014 Job Type : Contract We are looking out for a Front-end UI Mobile JavaScript developer for our Financial Client in Downtown Toronto. We need Junior and Senior Developers. Job ID: 6523-1 Duration: 7 months Project Scope:This role is a front-end UI Mobile JavaScript developer. The 2 Developers will be responsible for the design documentation, development, programming and unit testing of a new tablet application for Investorline specific to Ipad.Required skills:-At least 4 years of experience-Experience with mobile web and hybrid application development and mobile development platforms-Previous Financial experience is a huge asset Top Technical Skills:- Experience with Cordova- Java Script & libraries experience (Dojo mobile framework 1.8 and above)- Experience with JavaScript MVC design pattern,- HTML 5- CSS3 Other required skills:- AJAX, JSON, JS debugging- Familiar with Django Template Language (DTL).- Experience with responsive CSS front-end UI design framework, - Knowledgeable with SCSS. - Experienced with Eclipse JavaScript development, GitHub, Ant.- Strong with performance optimization for mobile applications.- Knowledge of app publishing processes for major app stores.- Familiar with web service technologies: REST, SOAP, XML.- Nice to have combined Android Java and iOS Objective-C programming experience- Understanding equity trading terminologies  If you are interested and qualified, please send your resume as a WORD attachment to niyati.bhatt@nexstaf.com or mathew.sebastian@nexstaf.com Â
